required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase I Clinical Study of SHR-A2009 for Injection in Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I, Open-Label, Multicenter Clinical Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Efficacy of SHR-A2009 for Injection in Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors

brief_summary.textblock: This study is an open-label, multicenter Phase I clinical trial to evaluate the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and efficacy of SHR-A2009 for injection in patients with advanced solid tumors.

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum tolerated dose (MTD) or maximum administered dose (MAD).
primary_outcome.description: Incidence and category of dose limiting toxicities (DLTs) during the first 21-day cycle of SHR-A2009 treatment.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From Day 1 to 90 days after last dose
primary_outcome.description: RP2D will be determined on the basis of evaluation on MTD/MAD, PK, efficacy data in dose escalation and dose expansion stages.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence and severity of adverse events (AEs)/serious adverse events (SAEs) ([CTCAE] v5.0)
primary_outcome.time_frame: From Day 1 to 90 days after last dose
primary_outcome.description: Assess safety and tolerability of SHR-A2009 by way of adverse events (CTCAE v5.0).

secondary_outcome.description: Time to maximum concentration of SHR-A2009
area under the concentration-time curve from time 0 to the last measurable concentration time point of SHR-A2009
area under the concentration-time curve from time 0 to infinity of SHR-A2009

arm_group.arm_group_label: SHR-A2009 for Injection will be administrated per dose level in which the patients are assigned.

intervention.description: In dose Escalation: SHR-A2009 will be administered intravenously. Six dose levels are preset. In dose Expansion: 2 to 3 dose cohorts will be selected for dose expansion stage. In indication Expansion: Indications will be selected to evaluate preliminary efficacy.
intervention.arm_group_label: SHR-A2009 for Injection will be administrated per dose level in which the patients are assigned.
